import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', company: '', message: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("Message sent! We'll get back to you within 24 hours."); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', company: '', message: '' }); }; const styles = { pageContainer: { marginTop: '64px', minHeight: '100vh', background: '#f8fafc' }, heroSection: { background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f1f5f9 0%, #e0e7ef 100%)', color: '#22223b', padding: '100px 0 60px', textAlign: 'center' }, container: { maxWidth: '1200px', margin: '0 auto', padding: '0 24px' }, title: { fontSize: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '2.25rem' : '3rem', fontWeight: 800, marginBottom: '22px', color: '#282828' }, highlight: { background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #02aabd, #00cdac)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', backgroundClip: 'text' }, subtitle: { fontSize: '1.15rem', maxWidth: '650px', margin: '0 auto', lineHeight: '1.6', opacity: 0.9, color: '#345' }, section: { padding: '60px 0', background: 'white', borderRadius: '24px', boxShadow: '0 10px 32px rgba(0,0,0,.05)' }, contactGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '1fr' : '1fr 1fr', gap: '48px', alignItems: 'start', marginTop: '30px' }, contactInfo: { color: '#24292f' }, contactItem: { marginBottom: '32px', padding: '28px', background: 'rgba(0, 187, 255, 0.045)', borderRadius: '14px', border: '1.5px solid #e2e8f0', boxShadow: '0 2px 8px rgba(0, 130, 245, 0.04)' }, contactIcon: { fontSize: '1.75rem', marginBottom: '10px', display: 'block' }, contactTitle: { fontSize: '1.13rem', fontWeight: 700, marginBottom: '9px' }, contactDetails: { opacity: 0.82, lineHeight: '1.5' }, contactForm: { background: 'white', padding: '40px', borderRadius: '18px', border: '1.5px solid #e0e0e0', boxShadow: '0 2px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.06)' }, formTitle: { fontSize: '1.6rem', fontWeight: 600, marginBottom: '26px', color: '#232529' }, formGroup: { marginBottom: '20px' }, label: { display: 'block', marginBottom: '8px', fontWeight: 500, color: '#363c41' }, input: { width: '100%', padding: '14px 18px', border: '1.5px solid #cbd5e1', borderRadius: '10px', fontSize: '1rem', background: '#f5f8fa', color: '#1a202c', outline: 'none', transition: 'border-color 0.2s', marginBottom: '2px' }, textarea: { width: '100%', padding: '14px 18px', border: '1.5px solid #cbd5e1', borderRadius: '10px', fontSize: '1rem', minHeight: '120px', resize: 'vertical', background: '#f5f8fa', color: '#1a202c', outline: 'none', marginBottom: '2px', transition: 'border-color 0.2s' }, submitButton: { background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #06b6d4, #818cf8)', color: 'white', padding: '13px 28px', borderRadius: '10px', border: 'none', fontSize: '1.03rem', fontWeight: 600, cursor: 'pointer', width: '100%', boxShadow: '0 1px 6px rgba(0,128,255,0.08)', transition: 'all 0.2s' } }; return (

setFormData({ ...formData, name: e.target.value })} required placeholder="Your full name" />
setFormData({ ...formData, email: e.target.value })} required placeholder="your.email@company.com" />
